import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { GlobalState } from '../../../GlobalState'; import OrderHistory from '../history/OrderHistory'; import ProductsManage from './ProductsManage' import CategopriesManage from './ProductsManage' function Admin() { const [key,setKey]=useState(1); const renderMain = (key) => { switch(key) { case (1): return ; case (2): return ""; default: return 'foo'; } } return (
  • setKey(1)}>Dashboard
  • setKey(2)}>Manage Category
  • setKey(3)}>Manage Product
  • setKey(4)}>Manage Blogs
  • setKey(5)}>History
{renderMain(key)}
) } export default Admin
